name: Rafa's World + Axolotl + Cat Milk
summary:
Take on the role of the boy Rafa in his own world full of creatures, monsters, diamonds, emeralds, boxes and a little shop to buy power-ups.

Explore over 50 different areas while trying to manage your stamina, passing through many types of traps.

This is a white little cat who loves to jump and to get into adventures around the town until he finds milk to drink. Once he accomplishes his mission, then it is time to go home.
